name: Color Miner - Mine for Colors!
description: This simple game trains your sense of color with infinitely many levels. You need to rearrange the color blocks to put them in the correct order. After completing each level, you will be rewarded with locks or some really really cute creatures. You can use the locks to minimize the difficulty of the game. You can also feed your creatures with the locks so that they can help you solve one step of the puzzle. Your goal is to collect 216 creatures of different colors. Take your time!
